languages.text: Whenever the wearer uses Combat Locus, the benefits of the targeted zone are multiplied by 4 instead of being doubled.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Whenever wielder uses Combat Locus, targeted zone's benefits are quadrupled, not doubled.
Whenever the wearer uses Combat Locus, the benefits of the targeted zone are multiplied by 4 instead of being doubled.

languages.text: 当装备者使用基卫战略时，目标区域的效果不再翻为2倍，而是会变为4倍。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses Combat Locus, the benefits of the targeted zone are multiplied by 4 instead of being doubled.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用基卫战略时，目标区域的效果不再翻为2倍，而是会变为4倍。

languages.text: 着用者が戦闘の軌跡を使用するたびに、対象ゾーンの効果は2倍ではなく4倍となる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses Combat Locus, the benefits of the targeted zone are multiplied by 4 instead of being doubled.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が戦闘の軌跡を使用するたびに、対象ゾーンの効果は2倍ではなく4倍となる。

languages.text: Cuando el portador usa Zona de combate, los beneficios de la zona objetivo se multiplican por 4 en vez de duplicarse.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses Combat Locus, the benefits of the targeted zone are multiplied by 4 instead of being doubled.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador usa Zona de combate, los beneficios de la zona objetivo se multiplican por 4 en vez de duplicarse.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger Kampfplatz einsetzt, werden die Vorteile der anvisierten Zone mit 4 multipliziert anstatt verdoppelt.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses Combat Locus, the benefits of the targeted zone are multiplied by 4 instead of being doubled.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger Kampfplatz einsetzt, werden die Vorteile der anvisierten Zone mit 4 multipliziert anstatt verdoppelt.

languages.text: Когда персонаж применяет Фокусировку, бонусы выбранной зоны умножаются на 4, а не на 2.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses Combat Locus, the benefits of the targeted zone are multiplied by 4 instead of being doubled.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж применяет Фокусировку, бонусы выбранной зоны умножаются на 4, а не на 2.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à Lieu de Combat, les avantages de la zone ciblée sont multipliés par 4 au lieu d'être doublés.
